messages.content: ComfyUI-moondream is a tiny vision language model built using the SigLIP, Phi-1.5, and LLaVA training dataset with 1.6B parameters. It runs on minimal hardware and generates accurate image and video content.
What datasets was ComfyUI-moondream trained on?
ComfyUI-moondream was trained on the SigLIP, Phi-1.5, and LLaVA datasets.
What is the size of the ComfyUI-moondream model?
What is the license for the ComfyUI-moondream model?
The weights of ComfyUI-moondream are licensed under CC-BY-SA due to the use of the LLaVA dataset.
What is the benchmark performance of ComfyUI-moondream?
ComfyUI-moondream scores 74.3 in VQAv2, 56.3 in GQA, 30.3 in VizWiz, and 39.8 in TextVQA benchmarks.

You can run ComfyUI-moondream on CPU by cloning the repository, installing the dependencies using `pip install -r requirements.txt`, and executing the `sample.py` script with the `--image` and `--prompt` arguments.

ComfyUI-moondream may generate inaccurate statements, struggle to adhere to intricate instructions, not work well with informal English, slang, or non-English languages, may have societal biases, and can generate offensive or hurtful content if prompted to.
